author: Patrick Strudwick
title: Here's How LGBTQ People Are Providing Support, Help, Food And Fun During The Coronavirus Crisis
description: "No LGBT person should feel that they're alone." As lockdowns kick in, queer groups, celebrities and charities have stepped up to offer a virtual community like never before. View Entire Post ›
content:
The journalists at BuzzFeed News are proud to bring you trustworthy and relevant reporting about the coronavirus. To help keep this news free, become a member and sign up for our newsletter, Outbreak Today.
